channel.title: {317}urgent question!{317}
channel.description:
ok well guys, --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ok guys, so i got the pest control monsters in my npc.cfg but now how can i let them attack the void knight and the other players and let them protect the portals?

item.title: {317}urgent question!{317}
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

item.title: {317}urgent question!{317}
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“pk george1, post:14, topic:331476”][quote author=madgamer link=topic=427855.msg3143481#msg3143481 date=1267836187]
Don’t have them spawn through autospawn.cfg, rather spawn them in the code and set it to attack the void knight.
[/quote]

Yh if you already have pest control added in your server, there should already be a few lines on code which spawm the portals. it will be like when you enter the game the portals spawm. The portals are counted as npcs. So if you want the npcs to spawm make them spawm in the code just add them after the portals spawming.[/quote]

and don’t forget to set their walkpaths and make them aggressive

Read full topic

item.title: {317}urgent question!{317}
item.dc:creator: @BlacknRaven BlacknRaven
item.description:
@BlacknRaven wrote:

Umm i tried figuring this out but i looked in npchandler and forund this:

Im not sure this is it but try it but you just pt the npc id in NPChandler.java
You May need to edit some of this but it will work most likely.

 } else if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
							npcs[i].animNumber = 2654; //Dead npc Animation
						} else {
							npcs[i].animNumber = 0x900; //Human death Animation
						}
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].DeadApply = true;
						npcs[i].actionTimer = 10;
                                                if(npcs[i].followingPlayer && server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null)
                                                server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].summonedNPCS--;
					} else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == true && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false && npcs[i] != null) {
  						MonsterDropItem(i);
						npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true;
						npcs[i].actionTimer = 60;
						npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX;
						npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY;
						npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328;
						npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP;
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
						npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;
					} else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == true) {
						for (int j = 1; j < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; j++) {
							if (server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
								server.playerHandler.players[j].RebuildNPCList = true;
							}
						}
